channel.title: [503/508] Question [503/508]
channel.description:
Ok guys , I have Palidino's Server+Client I wanted to get the server hosted so i changed the ''127.0.0.1'' on the Client's Client.java .
So i tried sending the client to my friend , but then he noticed an error something like this "error:Signlink:233 signlink:372"
--
Now , does he need the source to actually run it ? Or do i have to like configure alot of things ?

item.title: [503/508] Question [503/508]
item.dc:creator: @Mowiez Mowiez
item.description:
@Mowiez wrote:

You have to have the source running for him to play.

Read full topic

item.title: [503/508] Question [503/508]
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Tank Ags Tank
item.description:
@Ags_Tank wrote:

if your asking how to run the server, then you need to replace the 127.0.0.1 with your server ip that you set up with no-ip and then run the source on your computer, he does not need to run the source.

Read full topic
